c2z4uni: a Reference Manager in R for universities



What is c2z4uni (Cristin to Zotero)?

c2z4uni is an extension for the R package c2z. The purpose of the package is to create a Zotero library for your university, department, or research group. Use with the Hugo theme hugo-library to create an online reference library, and/or a R package (e.g., emayili) to create email newsletters.

See c2z4inn for a living example of the project.

Limitations

Please report any bugs/issues/requests here, and feel free to make a pull request.
